name: glib::param::unichar
description:
Glib::Param::Unichar - Wrapper for unichar parameters in GLib

HIERARCHY

Glib::ParamSpec
+----Glib::Param::Unichar

METHODS

double = $pspec->get_epsilon
double = $pspec->get_maximum
double = $pspec->get_minimum

SEE ALSO

Glib, Glib::ParamSpec, Glib::ParamSpec
